title: Grab / Drag / Grip handles should change the cursor on mouseover

content.raw:
In the Gazebo UI when you mouse over a the three lines of a grab / drag handle the cursor does not change. 

This hurts the discoverability of the feature and makes it more difficult to understand the bounding box where grabbing will have an effect. 

The standard is to alter the cursor to a closed hand, partial open hand, or other alternate cursor to indicate the affordance.
